name: Noisy Ninja
description:
Hello,

This is our first game jam, we are two students in first year game design school.

The idea is a musical infiltation (noise versus quietness).

In this game you play Nobu, a modern ninja, we want to get in the museum to steal the famous golden katana.

For this burglary, he will use his new stuff... a synthesizer who can hypnotize people.

the more you play well the more the security guys will let you go easy.
But paye attention at the laser detectors or you will be spotted !!

So you have to combine rythm and jump ability to be a real ninja !

Thanking :
thank to "AudioNautix"  for his free music "The voyage" which gave us this night vibes.

Thanks for playing.

Enjoy !

We need you to vote and give us some feedbacks...
